title: Removing dents / creases from coated canvas bags. : r/DesignerReps - Reddit
body: It takes a while to get creases out of any bag but one thing that really helps me is putting a large towel in the drier then stuffing that in the bag and closing it. The heat should push the wrinkle out from the inside! I also will use a hairdryer on the outside and try to smooth creases out with my hand inside. BioTix_ • 6 yr. ago.
readable_content:
- PM_ME_UR_SEXY_KYLES (2017-08-03): stuff it as much as you can. maybe with clothes and shirts instead of a pillow... pillows are too soft to create enough pressure.. once full stuffed to the max. use a hairdryer/ heat/ or hot water and it should make it re-form.
  - noside10 (2017-08-03): Can you post a pic?
    - [deleted] (2017-08-03): It takes a while to get creases out of any bag but one thing that really helps me is putting a large towel in the drier then stuffing that in the bag and closing it. The heat should push the wrinkle out from the inside! I also will use a hairdryer on the outside and try to smooth creases out with my hand inside
      - BioTix_ (2017-08-03): Did you get this from Zan, or beststuffcartel?
